name: Google Scribe
author: Sudar

sections.description:
Google Scribe is a WordPress Plugin, which allows you to enable Google Scribe to WordPress comment input box.
Google Scribe will be activated when the user clicks the comment textarea.
It also provides an option for users to disable Google Scribe if they are not interested.

Translation

  • Swedish (Thanks Thomas Persson)
  • Dutch (Thanks Rene of WPwebshop )

The pot file is available with the Plugin. If you are willing to do translation for the Plugin, use the pot file to create the .po files for your language and let me know. I will add it to the Plugin after giving credit to you.

Support

Support for the Plugin is available from the Plugin’s home page. If you have any questions or suggestions, do leave a comment there.

Links

  • Plugin home page
  • Author’s Blog
  • Other Plugins by the author

Readme Generator

This Readme file was generated using wp-readme, which generates readme files for WordPress Plugins.
sections.installation: Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.
sections.changelog:
v0.1 (2010-08-09)

  • Initial Release

v0.2 (2010-08-18)

  • Added the ability to disable Google Scribe

v0.3 (2010-08-30)

  • Added Swedish translations.

v0.4 (2011-01-23)

  • Added Dutch translations.
